description: This is a shell script designed for configuring and managing wireless interfaces, hostapd settings, network routes, and various system services related to Router Mode operations. It includes functions for restarting hostapd on 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands, manipulating network interfaces, updating configuration files, and starting essential services like dnsmasq and lighttpd.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on the 2.4 GHz interface by disabling and enabling the wireless interface and killing existing hostapd processes.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on the 5 GHz interface by removing and re-inserting kernel modules, then re-launching hostapd.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Kills existing hostapd processes and restarts the hostapd service on the 2.4 GHz interface.
